mapper.insert: insert into free_coment(freco_content,freco_credat, freco_moddat, fre_no, ui_no) values(#{freco_content}, now(), now(), #{fre_no}, #{ui_no})
mapper.delete: delete from free_coment where fre_no = #{fre_no} and ui_no = #{ui_no}
mapper.select: select freco_content, freco_moddat,fre_no,ui_no,freco_like, freco_unlike from free_coment where fre_no = #{fre_no}
